frontMatter.title: High Fidelity Prototype
frontMatter.metaDescription: Build a detailed prototype to demonstrate how the final product would operate and obtain feedback.

checklist.question: How do you validate new features and user flows with the target users before the actual implementation?
checklist.expectation: Make use of High-fidelity prototypes to validate the user flows, interactions and user behaviours

checklist.question: What elements do you include in your high fidelity prototypes?
checklist.expectation: High fidelity prototype should include visuals, user flows, required transitions and animations

checklist.question: What tools and software do you use to create high fidelity prototypes?
checklist.expectation: Choose a tool that the team is comfortable with. i.e. Sketch, photoshop, Illustrator etc...
